property.name: text
property.value:
This is an HDF model that consist of two levels of hiearchy. This model is similar to TwoLevelHierarchy.xml, but with transient states at the sub levels.
Author: Ye Zhou

svg.text: Create a state machine here (and ports, if needed) and create refinements for the states. Create transitions by holding the control key and dragging from one state to another. Then delete this annotation.

Create a state machine here (and ports, if needed) and create refinements for the states. Create transitions by holding the control key and dragging from one state to another. Then delete this annotation.

entity.name: Ramp
entity.doc: Create a sequence of tokens with increasing value
